alert.note: Alert for Plymouth; Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 12:27AM CDT until May 11 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Sioux County in northwestern Iowa... Northeastern Plymouth County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1226 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Merrill, or near Le Mars, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Public reported golf ball sized hail at 12:05 AM in Hinton, Iowa. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Le Mars around 1235 AM CDT. Struble around 1245 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Maurice, Orange City and Alton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
